argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | modxai.1 | |- N e. NN |
| 2 |  | modxai.2 | |- A e. NN |
| 3 |  | modxai.3 | |- B e. NN0 |
| 4 |  | modxai.4 | |- D e. ZZ |
| 5 |  | modxai.5 | |- K e. NN0 |
| 6 |  | modxai.6 | |- M e. NN0 |
| 7 |  | modxp1i.9 | |- ( ( A ^ B ) mod N ) = ( K mod N ) |
| 8 |  | modxp1i.7 | |- ( B + 1 ) = E |
| 9 |  | modxp1i.8 | |- ( ( D x. N ) + M ) = ( K x. A ) |
| 10 |  | #P_1nn0 | |- 1 e. NN0 |
| 11 | 2 | #P_nnnn0i | |- A e. NN0 |
| 12 | 2 | #P_nncni | |- A e. CC |
| 13 |  | #P_exp1 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A ^ 1 ) = A ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( A ^ 1 ) = A |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( A ^ 1 ) mod N ) = ( A mod N ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 10, 11, 7, 15, 8, 9 | #P_modxai | |- ( ( A ^ E ) mod N ) = ( M mod N ) |
